name: Tales of Selene
description:
Jump, run, attack, and survive: Like any other side-scroll platformer game, your objective is to survive as you jump, run, take down enemies, and avoid falling down. There are 20 unique levels in different worlds and environments to ensure you never get tired or bored, and there are always fresh challenges waiting for you. 

Controls

  • Move - D-PAD or joystick
  • Jump- Space bar or A button on gamepad
  • Normal Attack- C key or B button on gamepad
  • Fireballs- X key or X button on gamepad
  • Special Attack- Control key or Right bumper on gamepad

In order to use attacks, you must collect the potions that appear in the level.  

Green potions allow you to perform normal attacks.  

Blue potions allow you to throw fireballs.  

Purple potions allow you to perform super attacks.
